content.en: Trust algorithms: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address different research questions related to trust and security in the Internet of Things (IoT). These algorithms aim to improve privacy, protect personal data, enforce security measures, manage trust information, establish trust, detect trust-related attacks, enhance trust evaluation, mitigate malicious behavior, and design dynamic and scalable trust management models. The algorithms utilize techniques such as reputation coordination, trust evaluation mechanisms, trust management models, trust information management platforms, machine learning, logistic regression, and attack detection to achieve their objectives.
content.da: Tillidsalgoritmer: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at tackle forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til tillid og sikkerhed i Internet of Things (IoT). Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre privatliv, beskytte personlige data, håndhæve sikkerhedsforanstaltninger, administrere tillidsinformation, etablere tillid, opdage tillidsrelaterede angreb, forbedre tillidsevaluering, afbøde ondsindet adfærd og designe dynamiske og skalerbare tillidsstyringsmodeller. Algoritmerne benytter teknikker såsom omdømmekoordination, tillidsevalueringsmekanismer, tillidsstyringsmodeller, tillidsinformationsstyringsplatforme, maskinlæring, logistisk regression og angrebsdetektion for at nå deres mål.
